lead_paragraph: One of the two girls rescued from Boko Haram this week was abducted from her hometown, Madagali, and was not taken in a mass kidnapping in Chibok in 2014, an advocacy group said.

headline.main: A Girl Rescued in Nigeria Was Not Taken in Chibok Kidnapping, Group Says

snippet: One of the two girls rescued from Boko Haram this week was abducted from her hometown, Madagali, and was not taken in a mass kidnapping in Chibok in 2014, an advocacy group said.
